data.prayer: Lord, make the 1,683 believers in Severno-Banatski to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 232,717 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Severno-Banatski, Serbia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 1,683 believers in Severno-Banatski against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.
the state of Severno-Banatski has (about) 1,683 people who know Jesus, 184,001 people who know about him culturally, and 48,716 people who are far from Jesus.
Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Severno-Banatski, Serbia will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Gorani people. Make the Gorani people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 184,001 people in the state of Severno-Banatski who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Severno-Banatski, Serbia today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Severno-Banatski with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.
